page.title: 08AMENITIES IN LAMLASH.
page.content: {(1)Q:Are you happy with the amenities {in Lamlash ? A:Yes apart from the local bus service,particulary in winter. {(2)Q:What would you like to be {improved ? A:More buses going to different areas of the island. {(3)Q:Do you think Lamlash can cope {with the needs of ordinary people ? A:Yes. {(4)Q:Are you happy with the layout of {the village ? A:Yes. {(5)Q:What would you like to see being {brought to Lamlash ? A:More leisure facilities for children eg:Sports centre. {(6)Q:What would you change in Lamlash? A:I wouldn't change anything.
